title: So Happy And Grateful: The Universal Laws of Happiness And You
description: Antonio T. Smith, Jr. has been passionate about personal development for over 30 years. Now, for the first time, he shares everything he has learned about HAPPINESS so that you have the best chance of becoming the highest expression of yourself. In a way that only he can communicate. Antonio teaches: THE LAWS OF INTEGRITY THE LAWS OF EMOTION THE LAWS OF HAPPINESS THE LAWS OF SUBSTITUTION THE LAWS OF EXPRESSION THE LAWS OF REVERSIBILITY THE LAWS OF VISUALIZATION THE LAWS OF PRACTICE THE LAWS OF ATTRACTION THE LAWS OF DELIBERATE CREATION THE LAWS OF ALLOWING This is his first book in the So Happy Series, will help you become the happiest you have ever been so that you can create the quality of life that is worthy of you.
author: Antonio T. Smith Jr.
